summary: CONSUMER RECEIVED RECALL 04V357000 CONCERNING CAM SHAFT POSITION SENSOR.  TOOK VEHICLE TO THE DEALER AND HAD THE DEFECT SERVICED. ONE WEEK LATER, THE LIGHT CONTINUED TO COME ON. CONSUMER TOOK THE VEHICLE BACK TO DEALER  TO HAVE THE WORK DONE CORRECTLY. DEALER  ASKED CONSUMER TO PAY OUT OF POCKET BEFORE THEY COULD  DO ANYTHING TO THE VEHICLE.  ORIGINAL DEFECT STILL EXISTED.  *AK
